name: List specific SharePoint Framework (SPFx) packages installation at Tenant and Site Collection App Catalog
title: List specific SharePoint Framework (SPFx) packages installation at Tenant and Site Collection App Catalog
shortDescription: Generates a list of specific SPFx package installations within SharePoint Online environment which will help maintain oversight of SPFx package installation, ensuring they are up-to-date and compliant.
longDescription: List specific SharePoint Framework (SPFx) package installation at Tenant and Site Collection App Catalog which will help you maintain oversight of your SPFx solutions, ensuring they are up-to-date and compliant. The script was particularly useful in pinpointing sites within the tenant where third-party applications, specifically an analytics SPFx component, were deployed. This was crucial for ensuring that data collection was confined to designated sites, such as the intranet in my case study.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
